columns.Driver_ID: The unique identifier for each driver.
columns.Driver_Name: The full name of the driver.
columns.Entrant: The entity that entered the driver in the race.
columns.Constructor: The manufacturer associated with the driver's vehicle.
columns.Chassis: The specific model of the vehicle's chassis.
columns.Engine: The specification of the engine used in the vehicle.
columns.Age: The current age of the driver.

driver.table_description: The table stores information about race drivers and their vehicles.

columns.Road: The unique identifier for each race event.
columns.Driver_ID: The identifier linking to the participating driver.
columns.Race_Name: The official name of the race event.
columns.Pole_Position: The driver who started in the pole position.
columns.Fastest_Lap: The driver who recorded the fastest lap time.
columns.Winning_driver: The name of the driver who won the race.
columns.Winning_team: The team associated with the winning driver.
columns.Report: A summary report of the race event.

race.table_description: The table records key details about each race and its outcomes.
